X.i.4.C.3.e
.
Required Action on Letters Alleging Payee Non-Entitlement
When letters, anonymous or signed, are received alleging that a payee is
not
entitled to the benefit being paid, determine if the evidence is sufficient to warrant terminating benefits.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section C - Development of Philippine Claims
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section C
